definitions.definition: enormous; gigantic; massive; huge; immense; tremendous; colossal; great

parsedExamples.example: 巨大壓力 / 巨大压力  ―  jùdà yālì  ―  enormous pressure
巨大影響 / 巨大影响  ―  jùdà yǐngxiǎng  ―  tremendous influence
市场潛力巨大 / 市场潜力巨大  ―  shìchǎng qiánlì jùdà  ―  to have great market potential
